name: Canyon Bomber - Atari 2600 Remake
description:
This is a remake of the classic Atari 2600 game, Canyon Bomber. The game was originally created in 1977 by Howard Delman for Atari arcade systems. It was then re-made in colour for the Atari 2600. 

I have tried to recreate the Atari 2600 version as close as possible as part of a college project. I referenced this video a lot for things like score values, and figuring out how many solid blocks are in each layer.

Any suggestions or advice is greatly appreciated! I always love to chat about projects so if you have anything to say, please leave a comment below!
